name: Zhen Kun Cua
text: They’ve drastically lowered the incentives for drivers, causing a lot of drivers and operators to quit. Thus making it hard to get a ride, and thus the surge pricing. But drivers still complain that they don’t earn enough. So situation is just going to get worse

source_obj.text: They’ve drastically lowered the incentives for drivers, causing a lot of drivers and operators to quit. Thus making it hard to get a ride, and thus the surge pricing. But drivers still complain that they don’t earn enough. So situation is just going to get worse
